Class BMPWriter

java.lang.Object
  gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.io.writer.BMPWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IWriter
public class BMPWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IWriter

Bitmap File Writer. Uses JAI to write BufferedImage as BitMap. Uses JAI to write images.

Author:
Ryan Chute
